Name: Dried Tobacco
Description: Good for making spliffs and smoking alone.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Bueno para hacer cigarros y fumarlos sólo.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Gut um alleine zu Rauchen und Spaß zu haben
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Bon pour faire des joints et fumer seul.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Bom para fazer cigarros e fumar sozinho.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Хорошо подходит для изготовления самокруток и курения в одиночку.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Kendi başına yakmak ve sigara yapmak için iyi.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 适合制成卷烟或者独自吸烟。
